channel.title: people on Yoshiyuki Inoue
channel.description: Recent content in people on Yoshiyuki Inoue

item.title: Bachelor Thesis Presentation Day
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
item.description: We are pleasure to hear that two excellent undergraduate students in our group defended their bachelor thesis presentations. Katsunori Kusakabe looked into the stellar magnetic field condition to realize the magnetically arrested disk in X-ray binaries. Tatsuki Fujiwara worked on 26Al gamma-ray line signals from solar bodies as well as the estimation of past cosmic-ray activity using comets. Congratulations to all of them!

item.title: Dr. Ellis R. Owen joined our group.
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)

item.title: Our Group Member, Naomi Tsuji, is now an assistant professor at Kanagawa University .
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)

item.title: Bachelor Thesis Presentation Day
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
item.description: We are pleasure to hear that our excellent undergraduate student defended his bachelor thesis presentation. Tomoya Yamada worked on radio emission signals from AGN disk winds. Congratulations!

item.title: Dr. Tomonari Michiyama joined our group.
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)

item.title: Bachelor Thesis Presentation Day
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
item.description: We are pleasure to hear that our excellent undergraduate student defended his bachelor thesis presentation. Kaoru Yanagisawa worked on new PBH constraint method using AGN torus. Congratulations!

item.title: Dr. Naomi Tsuji joined our group.
item.author: yinoue_at_astro-osaka.jp (Yoshiyuki Inoue)
